products.title: 3-Piece Wheat Straw Baby Bowl Set - Cartoon Dinnerware with Spoon Fork
products.body_html:
3-Piece Cartoon Baby Bowl Tableware Set - Safe Wheat Straw Dinnerware

This functional 3-piece dining set features a cartoon bowknot bowl, fork, and spoon designed for toddlers and young children. Made from food-grade PP and wheat straw materials for safe daily use.

Product Specifications

  • Bowknot Bowl: 19.5 x 21CM
  • Spoon: 16 x 3.2CM
  • Fork: 15.5 x 2.5CM
  • Package Box: 22 x 4 x 20CM
  • Material: Food-grade PP and wheat straw

Available Colors

Choose from pink, light yellow, sky blue, or light green to match your child's preferences.

Key Features

  • Natural antibacterial properties for clean, safe dining
  • Cartoon design encourages children to eat independently
  • Non-slip ring at bowl bottom prevents spills
  • Double-ear handle design for easy gripping
  • Thickened bowl body stays cool to touch
  • Lightweight yet durable construction

What's Included

Complete set includes: 1 cartoon bowknot bowl, 1 spoon, and 1 fork

Important Notes

Colors may vary slightly due to monitor settings and lighting. Please allow 1-3cm measurement variance due to manual sizing.

  • Durable construction ensures long-lasting use compared to traditional brushes

products.title: Durable Waterproof Bib | Pocket Napkin for Baby Feeding
products.body_html:
A busy household often struggles with mealtimes when a proper Baby Napkin Bib isn't available. Spills soak through clothes, sticky messes spread everywhere, and parents are left changing outfits multiple times a day. It quickly turns a simple feeding into a frustrating, time-consuming task. The Baby Napkin Bib transforms that scenario, offering a soft, absorbent, and waterproof shield that keeps babies clean and parents stress-free.

Engineered for comfort and functionality, the Baby Napkin Bib ensures newborns and toddlers stay dry and fresh throughout mealtime. Its lightweight, breathable cotton fabric feels gentle on delicate skin and provides powerful protection. Whether at home, visiting family, or at a restaurant, this bib makes feeding sessions smoother and less messy, turning mealtime into bonding time.





 WHY THE BABY NAPKIN BIB IS A GAME-CHANGER


✅ SUPER ABSORBENT COTTON—This diaper is made with premium pure cotton that quickly absorbs dribbles and spills. It keeps your baby's clothes clean and dry, preventing irritation and discomfort.

✅ WATERPROOF LINING—A hidden waterproof layer blocks liquids from seeping through. Parents save time and laundry while ensuring their baby stays fresh after every meal.




✅ GENTLE ON SKIN—The Baby Napkin Bib is crafted from breathable, soft materials that protect against rashes. Babies can comfortably wear it for long periods without fussiness.

✅ ADJUSTABLE FIT—It is designed with easy snap closures that grow with your baby. This makes it perfect for newborns through toddlers, ensuring long-term use.




✅ EASY TO CLEAN—The baby napkin bib is Machine washable and quick-drying for convenience. Parents can reuse it multiple times a day without worry.



SIMPLE TO USE BABY NAPKIN BIB


1. Place the Baby Napkin Bib around your child's neck.

2. Adjust the snap closure to fit comfortably.

3. Let your baby enjoy meals, play, or teething without constant outfit changes.

4. Wash and reuse for stress-free feeding every time.


Studies show that over 70% of parents change their baby's clothes more than twice daily due to spills and drool. Without a Baby Napkin Bib, constant messes lead to more laundry, wasted time, and cranky babies who feel uncomfortable in wet clothing.

Families finally have an innovative, reliable solution with the Baby Napkin Bib. Its absorbent cotton, waterproof lining, and skin-friendly design make it easier to keep babies dry, clean, and happy. Parents enjoy fewer outfit changes, less laundry, and more time together.

products.title: Full-Coverage Baby Bib Smock | High Chair Feeding Gown
products.body_html:
A parent navigating mealtime without the proper support often feels trapped in a cycle of stress and cleanup. Clothes get drenched in puree, crumbs scatter across the tray, and the floor becomes a battlefield of food debris. What should be a moment of nourishment and bonding turns into a draining task. The Baby Eating Dining Chair Bib Cover Anti-Dirty Feeding Clothing Gown redefines this daily challenge by containing the chaos before it begins, creating a stress-free zone that makes feeding more straightforward and enjoyable.


Designed with full-body coverage, the gown links directly to the high chair tray, forming a contained barrier that captures every spill and crumb. Instead of meals ending in an endless wipe-down, everything is neatly managed, leaving more energy for connection and less for cleaning.






A Parent's Best Friend Full-Coverage Baby Bib Smock High Chair Feeding Gown


✅ MESS UNDER CONTROL – The innovative design prevents food from slipping past the tray, cutting down drastically on floor scrubbing and laundry loads.

✅ CONFIDENCE FOR SELF-FEEDING – A child can explore new textures and learn independent eating skills without the pressure of constant cleanup.




✅ DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN – Crafted from waterproof, stain-resistant material, the cover shrugs off even stubborn sauces. A single wipe restores it in seconds.

✅ ON-THE-GO CONVENIENCE – Compact folding makes it travel-ready, whether visiting relatives or dining at restaurants, ensuring mealtime stays manageable anywhere.




✅ ADJUSTABLE FIT – Elastic edges and flexible straps adapt to most high chairs and tables, always providing reliable coverage.



SIMPLE STEPS TO USE BABY BIB 


1. Slide it over the child's head and arms.

2. Secure the base to the high chair tray.

3. Secure with clips or fasteners for a snug fit.

4. Serve the meal and enjoy stress-free feeding.



The constant battle with mealtime mess can discourage trying new foods or enjoying meals away from home. The Baby Eating Dining Chair Bib Cover Anti-Dirty Feeding Clothing Gown changes that by creating a clean, controlled environment where exploration is encouraged and stress is reduced.

Full-Coverage Baby Bib Smock High Chair Feeding Gownm is a small yet impactful innovation, it transforms feeding time into a smoother, more positive experience—bringing relief to parents and freedom to children.

products.title: Nestacular's Mess-Free 2-in-1 Baby Feeder | Puree Squeeze Spoon
products.body_html:
The constant struggle of introducing a baby to solid foods can be a source of daily stress and frustration. Without a spoon explicitly designed for a baby's sensitive gums and small mouth, a person may face a constant cycle of gagging, messes, and a baby's refusal to eat. The constant struggle with these issues can result in fatigue, a lack of confidence in baby-led weaning, and a feeling of being unprepared, highlighting the critical need for an effective and reliable solution like a dedicated Baby Silicone Rice Paste Feeding Spoon. 


A proper Baby Silicone Rice Paste Feeding Spoon features a soft, flexible tip, a secure grip, and a seamless, easy-to-clean design for optimal convenience and safety. These items are designed to make the transition to solids easier, reduce messes, and ensure a baby is comfortably and safely fed. This proactive approach to mealtime ensures a smoother, more enjoyable family experience.


 



REASONS WHY A SILICONE FEEDING SPOON WILL CHANGE A BABY'S EXPERIENCE


✅ GENTLE ON SENSITIVE GUMS: A Baby Silicone Rice Paste Feeding Spoon is crafted from ultra-soft silicone that is gentle on a baby's delicate gums and new teeth. This feature makes it indispensable for preventing irritation and discomfort during feeding.

✅ PERFECT FOR FIRST FOODS: The shallow, flexible tip is designed to hold just the right amount of rice paste or pureed food, making it easy for a baby to accept and swallow. This design helps a parent confidently introduce a variety of first foods.




✅ EASY-TO-CLEAN & HYGIENIC: Silicone is a non-porous material resistant to bacteria and easy to clean. These spoons are designed with no seams or grooves where food can get stuck, making cleanup simple with soap and water or in the dishwasher.

✅ SAFE & CHILD-FRIENDLY MATERIALS: Crafted from high-quality, food-grade silicone, these spoons are free from BPA, PVC, and other harmful chemicals. The soft and flexible material is safe for a baby to bite and chew on.




✅ ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR PARENT'S HAND: The spoon's handle is shaped to fit comfortably in a person's hand, providing a secure grip and control during feeding. This reduces hand fatigue and ensures a stable, stress-free feeding session.



HOW TO USE A BABY SILICONE FEEDING SPOON


1. Wash Before Use: Before the first use and after each meal, wash the Baby Silicone Rice Paste Feeding Spoon with warm, soapy water or place it in the dishwasher.

2. Scoop the Food: Gently scoop a small amount of rice paste or pureed food onto the shallow tip of the spoon.

3, Feed the Baby: Carefully bring the spoon to the baby’s mouth, allowing the baby to gently close their lips around the soft tip to receive the food.

4. Clean After Use: After the meal, wash the spoon and store it in a clean, dry place.


 

The chronic issue of a messy mealtime, the frustration of a baby being uncomfortable, and the difficulty of finding an effective, on-demand solution often trigger stress, a lack of cleanliness, and disappointment. Relying on an inadequate utensil can increase a person's effort and reduce the quality of much-needed family time.



A proper Baby Silicone Rice Paste Feeding Spoon combines a gentle, flexible tip with an easy-to-clean, non-toxic design. Built-in simplicity actively addresses a baby's needs, while its comfort ensures a seamless experience. Each feature enhances a parent's peace of mind, reduces mealtime messes, and improves overall comfort, making these spoons an indispensable tool for anyone seeking a convenient and effective way to manage a baby's dining experience.



 

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Product Category: Baby Towel

Material: 100% Food-Grade Silicone

Capacity: 90ML

Heat Resistance: Up to 120℃

Use: Ideal for cereal and semi-liquid foods

Durability: Longer service life

REASONS WHY A BABY FEEDING TOWEL WILL CHANGE A BABY'S EXPERIENCE


✅ SUPERIOR ABSORPTION & PROTECTION: A Baby Feeding Towel is engineered with soft, absorbent material that effectively soaks up spills and drools. This feature makes it an indispensable tool for protecting a baby's clothes from food stains and messes, keeping them clean and dry.

products.title: Ultimate Spill-Proof Silicone Baby Feeding Bowl and Spoon Set - Safe & Durable Tableware for Happy Mealtimes!
products.body_html:
• Premium Quality Silicone Material: Our Premium Spill-Proof Silicone Baby Feeding Bowl and Spoon Set is crafted from 100% food-grade silicone, ensuring that your little one's meals are both safe and durable. This high-quality material is designed to withstand the rigors of daily feeding, providing peace of mind for parents.


 

• Innovative Spill-Proof Design: Say goodbye to messy mealtimes! The unique spill-proof design of this feeding bowl minimizes spills and messes, allowing your baby to explore their food without the worry of creating chaos. Cleanup is a breeze, making mealtime enjoyable for both you and your child.

 

• Versatile and Functional: This silicone baby feeding bowl is perfect for a variety of baby foods, from purees to solid bites. Its versatility enhances your child's feeding journey, accommodating their growing appetite and evolving tastes.

 

• Baby-Friendly Design: Specifically designed for infants, this silicone feeding bowl features a gentle curvature that makes it easy for tiny hands to grasp. The set is ideal for baby-led weaning, promoting independence during mealtimes while ensuring a safe feeding experience.

 

• Effortless Cleaning: Cleaning up after meals has never been easier! The silicone material allows for quick and easy cleaning, whether you choose to hand wash or toss it in the dishwasher. Spend less time scrubbing and more time enjoying precious moments with your little one.

 

• Secure Suction Cup Base: The upgraded large suction cups provide maximum stability, preventing your child from throwing their bowl during mealtime. Simply place it on any flat surface, and enjoy worry-free feeding sessions without the mess.

 

• Safe and Non-Toxic: Made from non-toxic, BPA-free, PVC-free, lead-free, and phthalate-free materials, this baby feeding bowl is designed with your child's health in mind. It won't leach harmful chemicals into your baby's food, ensuring a safe and healthy dining experience.

 

• Temperature Resistant: This durable silicone bowl can withstand temperatures ranging from -104°F to 392°F, making it safe for use in the microwave, dishwasher, oven, and freezer. Whether you're reheating meals or storing leftovers, this bowl has you covered.

 

• Stylish and Practical: With its sleek design and vibrant colors, this baby feeding bowl and spoon set is not only functional but also stylish. It's the perfect addition to your baby's mealtime essentials, making every meal a delightful experience.

 

• Origin: Mainland China

 

About this item:

*Prevent spills and messes with our innovative suction cup bowl! The BRVTOT baby bowl features upgraded large suction cups for maximum stability, ensuring worry-free mealtimes. It fits most flat surfaces, making it a must-have for any feeding setup.

*For optimal suction, apply a little water to the suction base before pressing it against a high chair or table. This silicone bowl is perfect for baby-led weaning and solid feeding, providing a safe and healthy option for your little one.

*Durable & Easy to Clean: Our thickened silicone bowl is designed to withstand the vigorous pulling of babies, ensuring long-lasting use. It resists corrosion and cleaning agent residue, making it easy to maintain. Hand washing takes less than a minute, or you can use baby wipes for quick cleanups!
